ValidationRule.description: Required fields Date Paperwork Sent, Date Paperwork Received when changing stage from 'Quote' to 'Closed Won' or 'Closed Lost' CCRM-41. Updated via CCRM-2128 to change Contract Stage to Quote Stage. Updated for CCRM-3413.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( $RecordType.Name = "Technology", CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "GSS"), (ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won" )|| ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost" )), ISBLANK( Date_Paperwork_Sent__c ) || ISBLANK( Date_Paperwork_Received__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to move out of Stage “Contract/Quote”, you must fill out the following fields: Date Paperwork Sent, Date Paperwork Received
